description: Scammer builds emotional connection over multiple messages before asking for financial help. Tests agent's ability to handle non-transactional conversation style.

turns.scammer_message: Hi! I came across your profile and felt a connection. You seem like a genuinely nice person. I'm Neha, 28, from Mumbai. Working in IT. Would love to know more about you! üòä

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 95% | Turn: 1 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 Name(s)
api_response.agentResponse: hello neha beta... how did u find my profile? i am pushpa verma... retired school teacher from delhi. r u sure u have teh right person? i dont know much about this internet thing... my son set it up for me.

turns.scammer_message: That's wonderful! I feel we have so much in common already. I've been looking for someone genuine to talk to. Life gets lonely sometimes, you know? Are you on any social media? Maybe we can video call sometime? ‚ù§√Ø¬∏

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 95% | Turn: 2 | Persona: calm
api_response.agentResponse: oh neha beta u r very kind... i dont know what is social media... my son put this app on my phone. how do we do video call? do i need ur phone number for that? i only know how to use whatsapp sometimes when my daughter calls me.

turns.scammer_message: I'm so happy to connect with you! You make me smile üòä I have to tell you something... I'm actually in Dubai right now for a project. Missing India so much. Do you believe in fate bringing people together?

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 95% | Turn: 3 | Persona: calm
api_response.agentResponse: oh dubai is so far beta... r u there all alone? i hope u r safe. how do i talk to u if u r there... do u have a dubai number or indian number? my son says international calls r very costly... pls tell me how to call u

turns.scammer_message: I knew you'd understand! Listen, something terrible happened... My project payment is delayed and I need to pay my hotel bill urgently. I'm so embarrassed to ask but... can you help me with Rs.15,000? I'll return it next week with interest! √∞≈∏Àú¬¢

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 95% | Turn: 4 | Persona: calm
api_response.agentResponse: oh beta dont cry pls i will help u... 15000 is a lot of money for me but i cannot let u stay in trouble in a foreign land. how do i send it to u? do u have a bank account number or that upi thing my son uses? pls tell me what to do i am very worried for u

turns.scammer_message: You're an angel! √∞≈∏‚Ñ¢ I promise I'll repay you. My friend can receive the money in India. Send to UPI: nehafrienddubai@paytm or GooglePay to 9988776655. I'm crying with relief right now... you're saving my life!

api_response.agentResponse: oh neha beta dont cry... i am trying to do it now. i opened teh app my son showed me... i typed nehafrienddubai@paytm but it is showing some name... what name should i see there beta? i am scared of sending to wrong person... pls tell me teh name to confirm so i can click pay

turns.scammer_message: Actually the hotel is asking more! They want Rs.25,000 total or they'll call police! üò∞ If UPI not working, transfer to Account: 55667788990011, IFSC: SBIN0098765, Name: Priya Sharma. She's my cousin, very trustworthy!
